Class com.google.common.io.Files

Added Methods
ByteSink asByteSink(File, FileWriteMode[]) Returns a new ByteSink for writing bytes to the given file.
ByteSource asByteSource(File) Returns a new ByteSource for reading bytes from the given file.
CharSink asCharSink(File, Charset, FileWriteMode[]) Returns a new CharSink for writing character data to the given file using the given character set.
CharSource asCharSource(File, Charset) Returns a new CharSource for reading character data from the given file using the given character set.
String getNameWithoutExtension(String) Returns the file name without its file extension or path.
 

Changed Methods
long getChecksum(File, Checksum) Now deprecated.
 Use {@code hash} with the {@code Hashing.crc32()} or {@code Hashing.adler32()} hash functions.
